name: Light live chat
author: LightChat.org

sections.description:
Providing an easy way for a live chat widget integration for LightChat customers.
Using the plugin you can easy setup target pages which will display the widget.
The plugin is supporting multilingual pages.
For using the plugin you need have an account in live chat LightChat.org.
After sign up you will be able to setup a widget design and get it code, after you need set the code in a plugin settings.
After it the widget will be displaying on your website target pages and you will be able to have a chat with go to special page in the service. This way doesn’t require any additional actions and your website modification. The widget is adaptive for different devices (pc/tablet/mobile).
Videoreview, more about the service.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin
  2. Go to a Settings - Light Chat widget page
  3. Modify the settings and save
  4. Widget will appear on the target pages – that’s all
sections.faq:
Is it free?

Yes, the plugin is free.
For widget creating and chat management you need to have an account in live chat LightChat.org – there is a free tariff.

How it works?

For using the plugin you need have an account in live chat LightChat.org.
After sign up you will be able to setup a widget design and get it code, after you need set the code in a plugin settings.
After it the widget will be displaying on your website target pages and you will be able to have a chat with go to special page in the service. This way doesn’t require any additional actions and your website modification.

Is it support multilingual?

Yes, the plugin correct works with multilingual and settings will display all pages.
Also the widget support multilingual.
